metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9395 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: The jas_seq2d_create function in jas_seq.c in JasPer before 1.900.25 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure) via a crafted file.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> this change breaks ABI and can't be used in stable releases. We will not be fixing this issue. Marking as ignored.

criterions.comment: jasper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
